title: Moderate Uptick In Cryptocurrency-Led Illicit Finance, But Volume Small: Report - NDTV Profit
content: Moderate Uptick In Cryptocurrency-Led Illicit Finance, But Volume Small: Report  NDTV Profit
description: US officials have observed an uptick in the use of digital assets to facilitate illicit finance since Russia invaded Ukraine, but the transaction volume is too small to play a big role in helping Moscow evade sweeping sanctions, a senior Treasury official said on Friday.
